page.title: 04WILBERFOSS WEEKENDS
page.content: People in Wilberfoss spend their weekends in a great many different ways. Out of 140 people questioned 42 people worked all or part of the weekend. People were asked what sports and pastimes they did in summer and winter. Swimming was the most popular sport in both seasons. Gardening was the most popular pastime in summer. There are 2 garden centres in, or near, the village and both are doing good business locally, owing to the large number of people who are interested in gardening. One of the centres has been open since 1965,the other opened more recently. The older of the two businesses stays open from 0900 till 1900 and is open seven days a week. It sells a wide variety of plants and gardeneing equipment. The other centre special- ises in trees and shrubs.
